abilities.name: Blazing Energy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. All Energy attached to your Pokémon are Fire Energy instead of their usual type until the end of your turn. (This includes cards that come into play on this turn.)

attacks.name: Lost Flame
attacks.effect: Put 2 Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon in the Lost Zone.
